result.review: You need a I phone for the watch to work properly. This should stated clearly in the product description by Amazon. Now have the hassle of returning the watch!

result.review_data: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 14 February 2022
result.name: Keith Ayling
result.title: Apple Watch
result.review: Great watch………… only let down as always is battery life

result.review_data: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 13 February 2022
result.name: Carlos The Jackal
result.title: The best Smart Watch gets better
result.review: I have had a number of Apple watches and they continue to get better.The quality is top notch and the oxygen sensor is a great addition.I would prefer them to make it thicker and put a larger battery inside, however, the battery tends to last me 2 days and charges very quickly.The midnight colour looks black for the most part but has a deep blue shine to when light hits it directly, barely noticeable and one thing I was worried about before purchase.The only disappointment for me was that the always on brightness looks no brighter than that of the Apple watch 5. If they could improve that as well as make many more watch faces then I would be happy. One thing I don’t understand is why the time looks so poor when in power save mode, how hard would it be to centre it on the screen.Recommended.

result.review_data: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 13 February 2022
result.name: Zaney17
result.title: Worth the upgrade
result.review: Upgrade for reliable and indestructible Iwatch3 and was worth the wait. Great bit of kit with good battery life and quicker charging.

result.review_data: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 12 February 2022
result.name: ChrisyBouy
result.title: You don't need it, of course, but so what?
result.review: Yeah, yeah… didn't need it but got it inanyway.

result.review_data: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 12 February 2022
result.name: Happy customer
result.title: Sons Christnas prezzie
result.review: I bought this watch for my son for a Christmas present. He said it takes a bit to set up but once he done it, well he seems to love it as hes never off it! It has loads of stuff on it to keep him entertained, which is always a good thing!Even in work were he cant take his phone, he can still see if anything important comes up on his watch.Everything he can do on a phone, he can do on his watch, his fitness has also improved as his watch tells him everything! Its also good on a night out, as he doesnt need to take his phone now, so cant lose it!Its been a brilliant buy for me as my sons over the moon with it and it keeps him entertained with the many apps on it, and i get a quiet life, win win for us!

result.review_data: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 11 February 2022
result.name: Barryman
result.title: Awesome sauce
result.review: It works! It all works! Have to charge it daily but it's basically running my life. Wakes me up. Tells my my cardio fitness level. Even asks me if im ok when my heart rate drops below 40bpm in my sleep.Colour me impressed

result.review_data: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 11 February 2022
result.name: leo villanueva
result.title: best pandemic offer of amazon
result.review: all i can say on my purchase is absolutely fantastic

result.review_data: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 10 February 2022
result.name: R G Musgrove
result.title: The best Apple watch right now
result.review: Bought this for my partner as a Christmas present and she loves it.Easy to get the hang of and very convenient if you don't want to get your phone out of your bag but want to read/send a text or make a call.Lots of features, and the fact you can personalise the background with a photo of your choice is a nice touch too.If you have got an iphone then I highly recommend this watch.Don't waste your money on expensive Apple strap options though as aftermarket options are available everywhere at a third of the price.
